DEAN.raw_line: Baroo-baroo, let's get this party started you mother-rubbers!Ronald Wilkes! No fucking way! The Ronimal! Gimme some love-uh, my soul broth-uh!What's the matter, friend, never seen a chocolate-vanilla love sandwich?! Wait until later when we get to the buttfucking! Nah, I'm having fun. Dean Ziegler. Stevens Point, Wisconsin.Don't worry, I won't bite. I'm medicated. Not really. But I should be. Right Ronimal? So what's your handle pal? Cedar Rapids, 6-12-09Call me Deanzie. Where you hail from, Tim Lippe? Quiet-land?Bill Krogstad's outfit. The Krogger! Aw shit. I was sorry as hell to hear about Lemke's passing up there. That guy was tits as a rep. Course he thought I was a big, loud asshole-- s'pose he wasn't too far off there. No boy, a real tragedy.Amen. He'll be in my prayers. His family, too. Tragedy.Well. I don't know about you wingnuts, but the Deanzie could use a drinkzie. What say we blow off the welcome hoo-ha and hit Horizons for happy hour. Two-for-one cocktails, 10 cent wings, and an all-you-care-to-eat pussy buffet!Oh, don't get me started on that smug fuck. Orin Helgesson is a-- pardon my French-- a cunt. Just a steaming wet dog cunt.Fine. Have fun ladies... Not.Party time. Excellent.Timbo! Over here roomie!How's she hanging Big Tim? Big time Big Tim...It's Deanzie, c'mon. Ahoy Cap'n, we got a thirsty sailor over here! Cedar Rapids, 6-12-09Kid was in the navy. Seaman.You want a nipple with that?Ach, I'm busting your balls. You don't get out much, do you buddy? Whoa, who'd you have to blow to get all those?Smug fuck. Trying to poison my roommate with his B-S propaganda.Wow-wow-wow, you are naïve. A rail cocktail's, what, four bucks? Times that by 10 drink coupons. We're talking 40 large, Tim. Doesn't sound so friendly anymore, does it? Sounds more like one of these I-scratch- your-back-you-scratch-mine deals. I bet ol' Orin invited you up to the Tiffany Suite, too, hmm? Fourth floor? View of the pool? Yup. Cocksucker's buying your vote, pal. Cedar Rapids, 6-12-09Ronimal! Taco Bill! Over here! Bill Hernandez. I call him Taco Bill. Mexican.So Big Time Tim, what're you looking for pussy-wise here in Cedar CRAPids?That your mom?My moral compass is pointing true north, if you read me. Right Taco Bill?And by the way, Ronimal-- I was married. Was.Ah, she's a fucking asshole. Cedar Rapids, 6-12-09Together 17 years. Lucky if one of `em was decent. ASS. FUCKING. HOLE.What I was talking about anyway, Ronimal, is that from what I can deduce, young Timbo Lippe here has led a-- shall I say-- sheltered existence. And I think we oughta help him, y'know, aroo-aroo!The O-Fox!Oh yeah baby. Shag-a-licious!Tim, this is the Queen Bee of ASMI, Joan Ostrowski-Fox. The O-Fox.No she's not.Oh yeah, Jaeger time!Whoa-o here she comes-- she's a man eater!I know. This needs to be private. Whoa. Something didn't agree with you, did it? Second thought, meet me in the stairwell after you wrap things up in here.You sound like my fuckin' wife, Timbo. Jesus. Ex, I should say. EX.Fuck yeah! Fuck yeah. But we didn't get to finish our little confab back at the bar. I figured some shit out. Cedar Rapids, 6-12-09Like I told you, no shocker-- Helgesson's buttering you up to get you in his camp, because he knows you and me are close...Close enough. You're voting for me for President, right?Well anyway, there's a petition going around trying to take away your company's Two Diamond Awards.Well hear this: After you left the bar, Mike Pyle comes up to me-- Pyle of shit, I call him-- and he asks do I want to sign this thing. And I go, "Lemke might have been a class-A deviant, but the guy was tits as a rep..."Joyce who...? Oh, no-no-no, whoa- whoa-whoa, that old whore called ME. Harping about Lemke being a pervert and how she wants to take her business elsewhere. So I says, "OK, I'll run some numbers." Well, she calls back later that same day, says she got Krogstad to lower her premium. Which is all the greasy twat wanted in the first place.I may be a lot of things, but poacher ain't one of `em.Personally? I think Mike Pyle of Shit started the thing as a way to drive down the price of your agency. Dollars to donuts he wants to swoop in and pick up Northlands at a bargain basement price. And you know what else I think? I think Orin's in on the deal somehow.I can't quite figure it myself, but I know what I know. And what I know is you're wading into some duvious, er dubious, shit. Just be careful.I'm saying a Bridge to the 22nd Century is a stupid theme, Helgesson. Not a goddamn one of us is even going to be alive in the 22nd Century...Stab me in the fucking back why don't you, Wilkes...Timbo! Sorry about that gigantic boner I got while we were spooning.Pyle of shit.Smug fuck. So who's ready for a drink?It's 11 in the morning. Can you believe this guy? C'mon Timbo, let's get the flock outta here.Timbo! Turn around!Come on bud, I was having fun.Let's roll, Perry-- Perry-plegic. Get it, like paraplegic? But...Know what that cow's thinking, Pyle? She's thinking, "quit pulling on my tits and fuck me already."I think I just shit my pants.Timbo and the O-Fox! Wondered when you crazy kids were gonna show up.You tag that yet, Timbo? Bet she's moist as a damp sponge, huh?Shit, what isn't wrong me? I drink too much, I weigh too much, I piss people off. Speaking of, that crank call earlier-- way outta line. People are right, I am an asshole.I love it! "I guess I've seen worse." I love it! Yeah shit, s'pose we all wish our lives had gone a little different. You don't come into this deal going, "Dear God, please let my wife toss me out on my ass. Please give my children the courage to hate my fucking guts. Thank you Jesus. Praise Jesus! Praise Jesus!" Ach, I'm just having fun. (crosses himself, looksMaybe you two should take one of those gay cruises together.Ha! I love it! Richard head!Would you rather toss a bum's salad, y'know, eat out his butthole or... give your dad a B-J?Check this out-- Captain Nemo!Hell yeah.Suck my ass, Helgesson.Come on, Ronimal! My key got wet. Wake up, man! Ah, fuck it.Timbo! Ronimal!You should have stuck around last night, Ronimal. Watching Timbo and the O-Fox get it on in the pool-- shit, I was harder than Chinese arithmetic.That time of the month? C'mon man, it's gonna be OK.C'mere, kiddo. Sit. Sit down. Cedar Rapids, 6-12-09My ex, Patti? Well-established fact that this broad is a serious fucking cuntstain, right? But like I say, she's made it pretty much so the kids hate my guts-- I'm the bad guy. `Cept when our 17-year-old daughter comes home PREGNANT-- oh yeah, happy day in the Ziegler household, lemme tell ya-- who's the one so depressed that she can't get out from under the afghan on the goddamn couch? Patti. And who's the one planning the baby showers and taking Meg to the gyno, all that shit? The fucking Deanzie. That's who.I'm telling you this, buddy, because it shows to go ya-- even if you're a fucking waste of space jerk-off like myself, there's always opportunities to do the right thing. If this Two Diamond bullshit and that matters so much, you'll find a way to make it right. If not, fuck it. Life's way too short to lose sleep over shit that don't matter.Vote for Deanzie. Vote for change.Well fuck you very much, Carla.I can count on your vote tomorrow, right Ronimal?You're all a bunch of dicks.Are you ready for this? Mike Pyle of Shit just bought Northlands. Word is the cocksucker's liquidating Timbo and the whole Brown Valley operation.Cry me a fucking river, honey. This isn't about you for once.You two are a couple of serious fucking downers, man. Timbo left here in a huff a few hours ago-- you saw him Ronimal. Maybe he already knew. Shit, the kid's one of my best friends...Know what, blow me Ronald. It's not my fault you're too goddamn afraid to open up and tell another man you love him. Do what you want, but the Deanzie's gonna make sure his friend is doing OK.Trying to reach Tim Lippe. Who am I talking to?That right? Is he there now?Who's Ken?I'll be standing by `case things get squirrelly in there. Getaway vehicle type scenario. Cedar Rapids, 6-12-09Mm-mow-mow... Two tickets to paradise. Hmm-hmm, pack your bags we'll leave tonight... Cedar Rapids, 6-12-09Oh fuck!What the fuck happened?The Ronimal!Wasn't just Krogstad, Timbo. Orin's the real devil in this deal.Sleep good, little friend.Hey Travis, I don't think Tim...Fuck yeah Timbo!What's the fucking charge?What's this?"Butt ram!" I love it!Want your get out of jail free card back?When I saw it, at first I was like, shit am I supposed to take money out of the account, or what?Nah, it was more fun watching the smug fuck sweat. I told him I'd rat his pathetic ass out if he didn't drop the charges against you.I'll show you some real wood.Well, pal, it's been real.Listen, my cousin Bob-- guy made a truckload selling these little scented pine trees all the ragheads hang in their cabs? Fuckin' believe that? Anyhow, he's got a sweet cottage up on Lake of the Woods. Canada? I can use it whenever I want. Cedar Rapids, 6-12-09I say we book it for June, before the mosquitoes go apeshit up there.Done.What was with the fuckin' unicorn?Jesus-- a retarded kid just sitting there yelling would've been better than you.

JOAN.raw_line: Don't get lippy with me, mister.So do you play professional basketball, Tim? Because that's a pretty updated uniform there.Oh, is that where a bunch of guys sit around a table looking up the word "gullible" in a dictionary?Indeed I am. I'm here for ASMI, too. In from Oh-my-god, Nebraska. Just kidding-- Omaha. Ugh, I am gross, so I'm going to bid you farewell, Tim Lippe. See you at Horizons tonight?Unless you were planning on spying on me in the shower.God, I am evil. I need help.Hubba-hubba, check out these studs.Here she is, Miss America.Yup. And boy are my arms tired.No, not really. I drove. Deanzie, let me say... ... you look maah-velous!Hey! It's Tim "don't get lippy with me" Lippe.Oh yeah, and I was very naughty in there. I'm sorry about that, Tim.No I'm not. Shots! What'll it be, gentlemen?Lippe?Careful you don't get too loaded, Lippe, or I might have to take advantage of you.I'm a very bad girl. But I swear I only smoke in Cedar Rapids. Care for a Virginia Slim, Lippe? Cedar Rapids, 6-12-09Whoa, what's wrong?D'you want me to kick his butt?Absolutely. I know Krogstad. I could take him. `Sides, I'm a ninja. A nin- jette, actually. Hoo-waaaah! So Lippe, how'd you end up in the insurance game? God that sounded dorky-- insurance game. Look here, see, how'd you end up in the insurance game, see...?Oh my God. Cedar Rapids, 6-12-09No way. Really?I remember that. Massive disaster.You realize you just made it sound cool to be an insurance salesman? You are a hero, Lippe.No, I can tell. You're the Superman type. Kind of dweeby on the surface but a real frickin' stud underneath. They'd call you Insurance Man-- put a big red "I" on your chest...Well, you're welcome. So can you fly me back to the hotel, Insurance Man? I'm freezing my arse off.Yeah, what was that call?You are very weird...Really? Why?Taco Bill.Heck yeah! I get to be Insurance Man's sidekick. We're going to kick some ASS!Whoo-hoo.Ooh, that's hot...Look at you...What a gyp. There are no stinkin' clues in here.Why would you possibly know that?Ugh. I'm gonna puke.Oh my God, did you just make a dick joke, Lippe?That doesn't even... There's no such thing as silo ice climbing.Of course you did. Well, you can do it then...You need to get over it, Lippe, cuz I'm not climbing jack. Cedar Rapids, 6-12-09Come on Insurance Man-- leap tall buildings in a single bound and all that...Hi Millie! Cedar Rapids, 6-12-09I'll just meet you inside.That's really nice. Cheers.So Lippe, I'm trying to figure you out. Hopes, dreams, aspirations, blah-blah-blah? Whaddaya got?Dream the impossible dream...C'mon, man. I mean fantasy-land stuff. What do you really want?Oh, screw him. He wants to sell, why don't you just buy Northlands?Why not? You could get a loan.You know the business. You know the clients. You actually care about your job. You'd be perfect. Cedar Rapids, 6-12-09Yeah well, you can have mine.Tyler's ten. Ashley'll be eight next month. My little squirrels.My hubby. Rich Fox. Richie. We met when we were both Rotary exchange students in high school. Lived in Norway for a semester.I was such a spaz. Band geek, total ugly duckling-- braces, acne, the whole nine. I didn't even get boobs until college. Anyway, we ended up getting married sophomore year. Then kids. Then blah-blah-blah, and here we are. Richie's a Supervisor in the Parks Department now. For the County.I know it's effed up. And if I had it all to do over again, I don't know what I'd choose. Cedar Rapids, 6-12-09But I don't have that option. So this is my fantasy-land, Tim. Cedar Rapids. ASMI. This. I come here, and for a few days I'm someone else. No kids. No husband. No responsibility. Wild woman. Sometimes a gal just needs a vacation from who she really is-- know what I mean, Lippe?One what?No, let's hear it...You wanna be on American Idol?That's great, Tim. You'll do it. I know you will. Very cool.Wanna get one for the road, stud?One nightcap. It'll loosen you up.What?Coors Lite's good for me, thanks. I gotta run wash my hands quick.Shots! Kamikazes, good sir.Why wait for the church choir when you can take care of one of your dreams right now, dude?I know you can do it, Lippe. Go be my hero-- Insurance Man. Cedar Rapids, 6-12-09Whaddaya say, Lippe? Take a dippy?So we stay in the shallow end. And neither did I.So.So.Cuddle? Um. OK. Cedar Rapids, 6-12-09No baby, you guys are playing at Papillion/La Vista. Ralston is next week... Calm down, Tyler. You're not gonna miss it. It's not that far. Put your dad on.Hey. Did you not look at the schedule on the fridge? Did we not have this conversation 10 minutes before I left? No, no, no. The playoffs are in Ralston. This is the last regular season game. He actually has a chance to play, Richie. Christ.Fine, but watch your speed on 84th by Giles Road. Chris Beeler's gotten busted twice right there. By that golf course. Yeah, Tara Hills. Exactly. OK. Love you, too. Bye. Oh, tell Ty to kick some butt for me. `K. See ya.Crisis on the home front. Sorry if I woke you up.Your cell phone kept ringing in your little fanny pack thing, so I shut it off. When I saw the discs, I figured I'd take a look. It's a solid presentation.Yeah, I see that. You know we were together right?It's so stupid-- but everyone basically treated us like the Brangelina of ASMI for a while there. It ended two years ago. He was getting into some pretty weird stuff... as we all know now.Come on, Lippe. It doesn't matter. You knew, didn't you?Tell me you're not jealous. You can't be jealous. The guy's dead.As good? Tim, Roger was a small- minded, egotistical jerk. You're an infinitely better man than he was.Why? I don't know. I don't know. I guess I probably maybe don't like myself very much. I don't know.What are you talking about?What this? What are you talking about? There's no this. There's no us. I have a family. Cedar Rapids, 6-12-09What about it? I told you, what I do here... In Cedar Rapids... It stays here.Come on, Tim. We're adults here. You're acting like a child...We used to get bands, Ronald. Real bands. Kansas. REO Speedwagon... Remember REO let me get on stage and play tambourine?Don't look at me. I don't think Tim likes me very much anymore.Fuck off, Dean. Jackass.Oh man. This place is bad news.So you're sending me into that shithole? How chivalrous, Dean.Thanks. Thank you. That's nice.Oh shit.Oh my God, Tim. Are you OK?You'll find another job, Lippe. Maybe even move to a new town.Get some sleep you guys. I'll stay up with him-- make sure he doesn't chew his arm off.It doesn't matter. Here, lie down, Lippe.Oh dear, what can the matter be Johnny's so long at the fair. He promised to bring me a pocket of posies...Oh shit...Deep subject. D'aar. Get it? I told you you were a hero, Lippe. Insurance Man saves the day!True sign of a good day.So. Keep in touch. E-mail, all that good stuff.If you're ever-- not that you would be-- ever in Oh-my-God, Nebraska...Yeah. Look me up.
